error.message: Call to deprecated function drush_delete_dir(): Use \Symfony\Component\Filesystem\Filesystem::remove.
Call to deprecated function drush_delete_dir(): Use \Symfony\Component\Filesystem\Filesystem::remove.
Add core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 to bxslider.info.yml to designate that the module is compatible with Drupal 9. See https://www.drupal.org/node/3070687.
